Restaurant choices are based on the cuisine preferences mentioned and are fictional examples. Accommodation options are based on available hotels in the respective cities and are used as examples. Attractions are chosen based on popularity and relevance to the itinerary. The budget has been considered, but specific costs are not provided as they can vary widely based on availability, season, and booking time.
